translations: v.食言，违约；（桥牌、惠斯特等牌戏中）有牌不跟；<古>拒绝，放弃

phrs.translation: 违约, 食言, 背信, 藏牌

sentences.sentence: Any more colourful candidate could renege on a deal.
sentences.translation: 任何不同政见的候选人都可能就此交易而报复。

sentences.sentence: It says firmly that the EU must not renege on its promise.
sentences.translation: 报告非常坚定地声称欧盟一定不会食言。

sentences.sentence: For one thing history tells us that the Republican Party would renege on its side of any deal as soon as it got the chance.
sentences.translation: 首先，历史告诉我们，共和党一有机会就会单方面背弃任何协定。
